pr_title: No longer enable CH by default in GraphHopper class

timeline.message:
Make sure CH enabled/disabled is chosen explicitly everywhere

* for any usage of GraphHopper there should either be a setCHEnabled(false) call or some CH profile strings should be set

* -> now we can remove it again :)

No longer enable CH by default in GraphHopper class

* remove enabled flag in CH/LMPreparationHandlers

timeline.bodyText: @michaz ? I wasn't sure if CH was used for this test only by accident (because of the default) or if its actually intended.
timeline.author: easbar

replies.bodyText: Seems like an accident, pt does not use CH -> removed this
replies.author: easbar

timeline.message: Remove CH for PT, update PT readme

Merge branch 'master' into no_ch_by_default
